title: Amazon admits its drivers sometimes have to pee in bottles
content:
Amazon has posted an apology to Rep. Mark Pocan (D-Wisc.) for a tweet last week denying that it makes its workers urinate in water bottles.

The controversy started with a tweet by Pocan blasting Amazon for its treatment of workersâ€”a topic of particular public interest as workers at an Amazon warehouse in Alabama were voting on whether to unionize.

"Paying workers $15/hr doesn't make you a 'progressive workplace' when you union-bust & make workers urinate in water bottles," Pocan wrote.
